children.text: The water pipes are crossing, or in direct contact with the electrical wiring.
The relevant Australian Standard AS/NZS 3000 Wiring Rules, clause 3.9.8.4 Proximity to Non-Electrical Services states that
‘Wiring systems shall maintain a separation of not less than 25mm from any above ground water piping for cable not in a conduit’ .
These water pipes and the electrical wiring need to be separated from each other at all locations.
